title: Mariupol teeters as Ukrainians defy surrender-or-die demand
content:
1. Mariupol teeters as Ukrainians defy surrender-or-die demand  The Associated Press
  2. Live updates: Russia invades Ukraine  CNN
  3. Ukrainian city Mariupol ‘doesn’t exist anymore’ after Russian army razed it to ground, official says  Fox News
  4. Russia-Ukraine War and Mariupol News: Live Updates  The New York Times
  5. 'The situation is very difficult' in Mariupol, Ukraine's president says  Los Angeles Times
contentSnippet:

localize.title: マリウポルは、ウクライナ人が降伏か死かの要求を拒否しているため、不安定な状態である。
乌克兰人拒绝投降或死亡的要求，马里乌波尔岌岌可危
烏克蘭人拒絕投降或死亡的要求，馬裏烏波爾岌岌可危
